title: Drawing, ca. 1924
medium: Graphite on white wove paper, with added margins and corrections.
description:
Design for a wrought iron gate with bird and foliate patterns, scrolls and leaves. The central element is surmounted by a pine cone. Sculptures of deer surmount the two side pillars. Design is constructed of collaged pieces of paper mounted to backing sheet. Left, right and top edge added to extend the sheet. On these edges, trees are indicated.
Verso: in graphite, sketches for two alternate concepts for gates, one including a figure for scale.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, ca. 1924.
ca. 1924. Graphite on white wove paper, with added margins and corrections.. Gift of Lincoln Kirstein. 1976-39-1.
